title: User_logs.csv, reduce memory with new tips
description: IntroductionThis kernel will not present new ML techniques, at least not now, but it will focus on different methods to reduce dataframe memory. Since this is my first kernel and moreover, and since english is not my mother tongue, please be indulgent. But any remarks/comments are welcome and appreciated. This notebook will described step-by-step the methods i have use to reduce dataframe memory and in particular focusing on this "famous to be so big" user_logs.csv. All methods presented here can be coupled with a "transformation" of the dataframe in an SQL DB or HDF-Storage.
